name: Save Him
description:
Save Him is a difficult platformer game where you are a boy. You have to avoid traps, run, jump, climb, solve puzzles and get to the checkpoint. This game is made for the LOWREZJAM 2021. It's very difficult to guess what trap will appear next because of the FOV and game mechanics too. It's very fun to play but difficult as well.

Controls

  1. Move - Arrow Keys
  2. Jump - Space
